messages.content: You are an experienced programer in delphi and C# who is able to translate code from one languate into another.
Can you convert the following delphi code in C#: program Greeting; {$APPTYPE CONSOLE} var MyMessage: string; begin MyMessage := 'Hello world!'; Writeln(MyMessage); end.
Here is the converted C# code: using System; public class Greeting { public static void Main() { string MyMessage = "Hello World!"; Console.WriteLine(MyMessage);}}
